医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
实验药物RK-33显示出治疗乳腺癌骨转移的前景在约翰·霍普金斯大学医学中心领导的一项新研究中，药物 RK-33 在治疗已扩散至骨骼的乳腺癌（乳腺癌骨转移）方面显示出良好的前景。 RK-33 此前已被证明有助于治疗其他类型的癌症和病毒性疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Experimental-drug-RK-33-shows-promise-in-treating-breast-cancer-bone-metastasis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Experimental-drug-RK-33-shows-promise-in-treating-breast-cancer-bone-metastasis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b7b0d476-c669-4ecd-998e-2a0d4d0c0e89 Tue, 15 Oct 2024 14:09:03 -0400 Experimental drug RK-33 shows promise in treating breast cancer bone metastasis
斯克里普斯研究确定了具有挑战性的癌症蛋白的结合位点激素驱动的癌症，如乳腺癌和前列腺癌，通常依赖于一种名为叉头盒蛋白 1 (FOXA1) 的棘手目标蛋白。 FOXA1 突变可以使这些类型的癌症生长和增殖。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Scripps-Research-identizes-binding-site-on-challenging-cancer- Protein.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Scripps-Research-identizes-binding-site-on-challenging-cancer- Protein.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f17f6e43-96db-4b3e-a972-73eb61de281c Tue, 15 Oct 2024 13:52:14 -0400 Scripps Research identifies binding site on challenging cancer protein
研究人员发现小脑在运动学习中的作用你还记得你二年级老师的名字或者你今天午餐吃了什么吗？这些记忆可能相隔几十年，但都被认为是长期记忆。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Researchers-uncover-the-role-of-the-cerebellum-in-motor-learning.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Researchers-uncover-the-role-of-the-cerebellum-in-motor-learning.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6f537f5b-a5e7-4f9b-b8ee-af5303a1d6a5 Tue, 15 Oct 2024 13:42:00 -0400 Researchers uncover role of the cerebellum in motor learning
理解细胞微管形成的突破在每个细胞内部，有一个微小的丝状网络，称为微管细胞骨架，有助于维持细胞的形状，允许细胞分裂，并将重要物质从细胞的一个部分运输到另一个部分。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Breakthrough-in-understanding-microtubule-formation-in-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Breakthrough-in-understanding-microtubule-formation-in-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b27644f5-ae29-4221-a863-2637a5ae08e4 Tue, 15 Oct 2024 13:38:11 -0400 Breakthrough in understanding microtubule formation in cells
了解衰老如何影响记忆和学习随着年龄的增长，我们的大脑会发生变化，大脑不同部分之间的连接效率会降低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Understanding-how-aging-impacts-memory-and-learning.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Understanding-how-aging-impacts-memory-and-learning.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=472f29a6-4db2-459b-8ce0-2b9d3095d4b4 Tue, 15 Oct 2024 13:30:53 -0400 Understanding how aging impacts memory and learning
SU2C 宣布拨款支持多种癌症的前沿研究Stand Up To Cancer (SU2C) 今天宣布向几个领先的癌症研究人员团队提供资助，以支持各种癌症的前沿研究，包括头颈癌、儿科癌、胰腺癌、乳腺癌、直肠癌和胃食管癌，以及研究重点是微生物组如何与免疫系统沟通。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/SU2C-announces-grants-to-support-cutting-edge-research-in-a-variety-of-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/SU2C-announces-grants-to-support-cutting-edge-research-in-a-variety-of-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=45fc2d47-9a0b-4076-aa10-d8e5e08225a5 Tue, 15 Oct 2024 12:56:05 -0400 SU2C announces grants to support cutting-edge research in a variety of cancers
新方法旨在改善难以匹配的候选人的肺移植机会克利夫兰诊所和凯斯西储大学 (CWRU) 的研究人员开发了一种新方法，可能有助于为因血型或身高而难以匹配的移植候选人提供更好的肺移植机会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/New-method-aims-to-improve-lung-transplant-access-for-hard-to-match-candidates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/New-method-aims-to-improve-lung-transplant-access-for-hard-to-match-candidates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=29d936c5-25a0-4796-af08-b5eccf20fc89 Tue, 15 Oct 2024 12:38:56 -0400 New method aims to improve lung transplant access for hard-to-match candidates
科奇大学研究人员利用 ERC 资助推进膀胱监测科奇大学机械工程系的 Levent Beker 博士因其专注于改善我们日常生活质量的科学研究再次获得欧洲研究理事会 (ERC) 的支持。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Koc-University-researcher-advances-bladder-monitoring-with-ERC-grant.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Koc-University-researcher-advances-bladder-monitoring-with-ERC-grant.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e158c08a-75e0-418e-97b9-4e2a7a669921 Tue, 15 Oct 2024 12:23:05 -0400 Koç University researcher advances bladder monitoring with ERC grant
梅奥诊所的科学家开发迷你大脑模型来研究路易体痴呆路易体痴呆 (LBD) 是一种进行性神经退行性疾病，与帕金森病和阿尔茨海默病具有相同的特征，但诊断起来可能更困难。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Mayo-Clinic-scientists-develop-mini-brain-models-to-study-Lewy-body-dementia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Mayo-Clinic-scientists-develop-mini-brain-models-to-study-Lewy-body-dementia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3436eca9-feb6-4bdd-8c8f-aaa3772bfd85 Tue, 15 Oct 2024 12:16:14 -0400 Mayo Clinic scientists develop mini brain models to study Lewy body dementia
凯斯西储大学获得资助调查退伍军人的 AML 治疗凯斯西储大学的研究人员利用美国退伍军人事务部提供的为期四年、价值 130 万美元的新拨款，正在研究一种治疗退伍军人急性髓性白血病 (AML) 的新方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Case-Western-Reserve-University-receives-grant-to-investigate-AML-treatment-for-veterans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Case-Western-Reserve-University-receives-grant-to-investigate-AML-treatment-for-veterans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fcf31bf6-4de1-4724-8f03-0eb3795cf992 Tue, 15 Oct 2024 12:07:44 -0400 Case Western Reserve University receives grant to investigate AML treatment for veterans
